ud1.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava gayayam viharati gayasise.
ud1.9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula jatila sitasu hemantikasu rattisu antaratthake himapatasamaye gayayam ummujjantipi nimujjantipi, ummujjanimujjampi karonti osincantipi, aggimpi juhanti:
ud1.9:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava te sambahule jatile sitasu hemantikasu rattisu antaratthake himapatasamaye gayayam ummujjantepi nimujjantepi ummujjanimujjampi karonte osincantepi aggimpi juhante:
ud1.9:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
